Subsection.Text: The department shall prepare, not more than 180 days after October 1, 1987, a certification examination to determine the qualifications of persons to engage in the inspection of boilers in this state. This examination shall be equivalent to the examination requirements of the National Board of Boiler and Pressure Vessel Inspectors.
Any person who desires to be certified to inspect boilers must apply in writing to the department to take the certification examination. Such person may take the examination if the person:

Paragraph.Text: Is at least 18 years of age; and
Has at least 3 years’ experience in the construction, installation, inspection, operation, maintenance, or repair of high pressure, high temperature water boilers.
